#summary Instructions on compiling Wiiflow.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

1. Download and install latest devkitProPPC r18 or r19

2. Download [http://wiiflow.googlecode.com/files/libogc-23-10-09-DevkitR18-19.zip libogc-23-10-09-DevkitR18-19.zip] and extract it to your devkitPro directory.

2. Download the source from [http://wiiflow.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ SVN].

3. Run Programmer's Notepad (installed with devkitPro)

4. Open the Makefile from the source you downloaded. Click Tools > Make.

5. Done!
